original: Dukkhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci dukkhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, dukkhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
analyzed: dukkha abhinandino sattāḥ atthi keci dukkham patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti dukkham ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti iti

original: nanu sukhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci sukhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
analyzed: nanu sukha abhinandinaḥ sattāḥ atthi keci sukham patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti sukham ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti iti

original: Hañci sukhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci sukhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sukha abhinandinaḥ sattāḥ atthi keci sukham patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti sukham ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Dukkhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, sukhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti?
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya rāga anusayaḥ anuseti sukhāya vedanāya paṭigha anusayaḥ anuseti iti

original: nanu sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti?
analyzed: nanu sukhāya vedanāya rāga anusayaḥ anuseti dukkhāya vedanāya paṭigha anusayaḥ anuseti iti

original: Hañci sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anuseti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sukhāya vedanāya rāga anusayaḥ anuseti dukkhāya vedanāya paṭigha anusayaḥ anuseti no ca vata re vattabbe

original: “so evaṁ anurodhavirodhaṁ samāpanno yaṁ kiñci vedanaṁ vedayati sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
analyzed: saḥ evam anurodha virodham samāpannaḥ yam kiñci vedanam vedayati sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā so tam vedanam abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati iti
